Lines.94202cb7-83a3-31c4-696c-e2b830f6070e: Let us return to the Elfsong Tavern. You need rest.
Lines.c37931a4-7c8f-a104-2662-fef50cfd4e5a: Will you return to the Elfsong Tavern with me? I would like to discuss that with you... in detail.
Lines.125a71d1-faac-ca80-6010-c2fb0ab3fed3: Very well. It is best if we take the sewers... I am too tired to maintain a disguise.
